using namespace std;
 
ll power(ll p,ll q,ll m){
ll aaa=1;
while(q){
if(q&1) aaa=(aaa*p)%m;
p=(p*p)%m;
q/=2;
}
return aaa;
}
 
ll gcd(ll p,ll q){
if(q==0) return p;
else return(gcd(q,p%q));
}
 
bool cmprr(const pair<char,ll>& p,const pair<char,ll> &q){
return p.Y<q.Y;
}

int i,j,k,n,t,a[N],pppp[N],val[20];
 
int main(){
inp(t);
int smm;
while(t--){
inp(n);
pppp[0]=0;
rep(i,1,n+1) inp(a[i]);
rep(i,1,11) inp(val[i]);
smm=a[1];
pppp[1]=val[a[1]];
rep(i,2,n+1){
smm+=a[i];
int p,mamamia=INT_MAX,idx=i-1,to=smm-a[i];
for(;(smm-to)<=10&&(i-idx)<=3;idx--){
//cout<<idx<<" "<<smm-to<<'\n';
p=(smm-to);
mamamia=min(mamamia,pppp[idx]+val[p]);
to-=a[idx];
}
//cout<<mamamia<<'\n';
pppp[i]=mamamia;
}
cout<<pppp[n];
cout<<'\n';
}
return 0;
}
